Title: Tokyo Tower TOP DECK Ticket

h1.ActOnSpecifiedCommercialTransactions: Representation under the Act on Specified Commercial Transactions
h1.AdvanceTicketSalesWebsite: Advance Ticket Sales Website for customers who were affected by the ticket system trouble.

h2.LoginForSponsors: Log in for people related to TTTS

Label.PleaseEnterWatcherName: Enter the name of the person who will see the film.(samplesmith)
Label.Name: Name
Label.PurchaseEntryTime: Foottown 1st floor priority lane reception time
Label.TermsGuideText: Read through the Terms of use. Click the Accept the Terms of Use and click on the Next button to proceed.
Label.SelectSeatsGuideText: Select a seat and click on the Next button.
Label.SelectSeatsGuideTextSP:
The screen will zoom when you touch it.
And then, select a seat.
Label.SelectTicketsGuideText: Please select the type of ticket you want and the number of sheets and click Next button.
Label.EnterProfileGuideText: Please enter your information and payment information and click Next button.
Label.EnterProfileGuideTextWindow: Select a method of payment and click on the Next button.
Label.ConfirmReservationGuideText: Please check the purchase details and push Purchase Confirmation button.
Label.ConfirmReservationGuideTextNoPayment: Check the details and click on the Next button.
Label.CompleteReservationGuideText:
Thank you for your purchase.
I sent a purchase completion mail to the mail address you entered.
Please confirm e-mail regarding how to enter.
Label.CompleteTemporaryReservationGuideText:
Now your tentative reservation is complete.
An email was sent to you that includes the details of the tentative reservation.
Make a payment at the nearest FamilyMart location to complete the purchase.
*It may take some time to send you an email with QR code. Thank you for your patience.
Label.SelectPerformanceGuideText: 請選擇所需的日期和時間。
Label.ReleaseSeatsGuideText: Select the date to release cancelled seats and click on the Release cancelled seats button.
Label.NotFoundGuideText: This page does not exist or the input of the URL may be incorrect.
Label.AdvanceTicketSalesWebsiteGuideText: We are deeply sorry for the anxiety and inconvenience we caused you and all parties concerned.
Label.AdvanceTicketSalesWebsiteGuideText2: Please read the terms and conditions above carefully and press the button to log in. Enter your ID and password.
Label.RedirectToThirdPartyWebsite:
You will be redirected
to a third-party website.
Label.RequireCustomerNumberAndConfirmationNumb: Your customer number and the confirmation number below are required at the time of payment.
Label.NameOfPersonWhoWillSeeFilm: The name of the person who will see the film
Label.AboutTOPDECKTicket: "TOP DECK TICKET" can be entered into "TOP DECK" and "Main Observatory".

Button.AcceptTermsAndNext:
Accept the Terms of Use
and click on the Next
Button.ReserveMoreSameShow:
Reserve more tickets
for the same show.
Button.CompleteReservationCautionText: * The following QR code will be an entry ticket. Please save or print and bring it.
Button.TicketQRInfo: Please present this QR code to staff at entrance.
Button.TicketQRAuthInfo: (Please present QR code at 2 places of Foottown 1F's Preferred Lane and TOP DECK TOUR entrance of 2 Observatory 2F.)

FieldName.name: Name (in alphabet or full-width katakana)

Enable automatic log in

Message.NoSchedule: There are no cards that can be scheduled in the selected year / month.
Message.regexTelRange{{fieldName}}{{min}}{{max}}: Check that the number of digits for {{fieldName}} is {{min}} or more but does not exceed {{max}}.
Message.EnterInFullWidthKatakana: Enter in alphabet or full-width katakana.
Message.SettingForLimitingEmailReception:
*Enter an email address that accepts HTML messages.
[If you use an email filter or setting for specified domains.]
* If you use a filter to limit messages to specified domains for you mobile phone, additionally set the domain "@tokyotower.co.jp"
*If you use au (@ezweb.ne.jp), in addition to the above setting, additionally set the domain "@tokyotower.co.jp" under the "list for exemption from spam."
Message.UseHalfWidthAlphanumericWithoutHyphens: Use half-width alphanumeric. Do not use hyphens.If you are outside of Japan please enter from country code without "+".
Message.seatsLimit{{limit}}: The maximum number of seats is {{limit}}.
Message.UnexpectedError: A system error has occurred. Please try again later. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Message.UnavailableSeat: The seat that you have selected is not available.
Message.SelectedSeatsUnavailable: The seat that you have selected is not available.
Message.NoMoreReservation: You have already selected the maximum number of seats.
Message.regexTel: Use half-width alphanumeric. Do not use hyphens.
Message.AreYouSureCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
Message.InvalidSeatCode: The seat number that you have selected is invalid.
Message.UpdateWatcherNameHelp:
* Use full-width katakana for the Japanese names and in half-width alphanumeric characters for foreign names.
* Do not leave a half-width space between the last name and the first name.
Message.invalidPaymentNoOrLast4DigitsOfTel: There are some mistakes in a transaction number or last 4 digits of tel.
Message.cardNumber: ※Please enter without half-width numeric characters, hyphen "-"
Message.TransactionNumberDescription: ※Please be sure to remember as it will be the number required for inquiries of reservation.
Message.AboutEntryDescription:
Regarding how to enter the special observation platform
please confirm by clicking "About the entry method" button below.
Message.CreditAvailable: You can use VISA, Master, JCB, AMEX, DINERS.
Message.TicketInfoMsg: Thank you for your purchase. Please present the QR code of the ticket to the staff at the entrance on the day of reservation.
Message.TicketQRAuthInfo: (Please present QR code at 2 places of Foottown 1F's Preferred Lane and TOP DECK TOUR entrance of 2 Observatory 2F.)
Message.TicketNotesContents:
* Ticket cancellation is possible until 23:59 3 days before coming tower day. * For cancellation of tickets, a cancellation fee of 400 yen will be charged.
* You can not change the date and time after purchase. Please purchase again after cancellation. * If you can not come to the tower at the appointment date and time, you may not be able to attend the tour.
* We will not change tickets, cancel or refund on the day.
* Resale of purchased tickets is strictly prohibited. We assume no responsibility for any disadvantage or damage between customers caused by resale.
Message.FootTownInfo: The guide staff is on standby before the entrance to the priority lane of Foot Town 1F.
Message.EntryFootTown: Please accept reception at Foottown 1F priority lane during the following hours.

Steps.SelectTickets: Select a bill type / number of sheets

Avalilable.Name: Unoccupied
Avalilable.Caption: Click on a seat to select it

Selected.Name: Selected
Selected.Caption: Click on a seat to cancel the selection

ConfirmNotesText:
- We will not refund, exchange, or re-issue tickets.
- If you use a filter to limit messages to specified domains for you mobile phone, additionally set the domain "@tokyotower.co.jp"
- If you use au (@ezweb.ne.jp), in addition to the above setting, additionally set the domain "@tokyotower.co.jp" under the "list for exemption from spam."
CompleteNotesText:
· Please check whether there is any incompleteness in the mail address or not being rejected for incoming mail.
· If you have enabled the filtering function of the mail settings of providers and mobile carrier companies, please check "deleted folder" or "spam folder". * We will not retransmit the purchase completion mail for automatic transmission.
* Please make purchase confirmation on "Ticket inquiry page" after refraining "purchase number".
NoticeCVS:
*The time allotted for payment at the convenience store is three (3) days from the date of the completion of your order.
*In the case of payment at the convenience store, each seat purchased is subject to a processing fee of 150 yen per seat. This fee is included in the total price.
*Payment at a convenience store can be only made at FamilyMart locations in Japan.
